title-group.article-title: FIRST DERIVATIVES ESTIMATES FOR FINITE-DIFFERENCE SCHEMES

abstract.p: We give sufficient conditions under which solutions of discretized in space second-order parabolic and elliptic equations, perhaps degenerate, admit estimates of the first derivatives in the space variables independent of the mesh size.
